info.title: What is Narrow Listening?
info.description: Narrow listening is a technique where you listen to the same content with slight variations. This helps you notice differences in grammar, vocabulary, and usage while maintaining context. Your pack will include:

features.versions: 5 versions of the same story with different grammar patterns
features.slowAudio: Slow audio (0.7x speed) for shadowing practice
features.normalAudio: Optional normal speed audio (1.0x) when you're ready
features.textJa: Japanese text with furigana and English translations
features.textZh: Chinese text with pinyin and English translations
